name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou with Power-Up Kit
name_original: Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou with Power-Up Kit
description:
Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou with Power-Up Kit is a strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It came out on 17-12-2010. It was published by Koei Tecmo Games.
You can play Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou with Power-Up Kit on PlayStation 3, PS Vita and PC.
